text.div:
HCV Antibody Test

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13955-0 Hepatitis C virus Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay

    22329-7 Hepatitis C virus c33c Ab [Presence] in Serum

    44831-6 Hepatitis C virus c100p+5-1-1 Ab [Presence] in Serum
    48159-8 Hepatitis C virus Ab Signal/Cutoff in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    51824-1 Hepatitis C virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum by Immunoassay

    75886-2 HCV antibody screening - Meaningful Use set
